About

The Game

This is a word game that has a Czech and an English version. The same as all the word games out there, this app's main goal is to strengthen your vocabulary knowledge in those two languages, but the difference is that this app gives you a sense of progress and achievement through the points & the titling system. You also get a list of all the words you have solved since your registration, in case you wanted to revise and memorize the words. As a motivation, you get to know who are the top 5 players in the game and compete with them as well!

The titling system goes as follows:

  • Absolute Beginner: 0 - 250
  • Beginner: 250 - 500
  • Absolute Amateur: 500 - 1000
  • Amateur: 1000 - 1500
  • Semi-Professional: 1500 - 2250
  • Professional: 2250 - 3250
  • Absolute Professional: 3250 - 4500
  • Semi-Legend: 4500 - 6000
  • Legend: 6000 - 7500
  • Absolute Legend: 7500 - 10000
  • IMMORTAL LEGEND!: 10000 - ~

P.S: You get 10 points for each word

P.S: I called the game vintage-inspired, just because the design gave me some weird nostalgia vibes of times, when websites only consisted of boxes, buttons and a weird combination of colours. The colour scheme used for the design is actually inspired from the flag of the Czech Republic, which consists of white, blue and red.
